A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It's just a bad movie. Long and boring\, messy and incoherent. Riddled with plotholes\, pointless plotlines\, wasted characters and gibberish dialogue. 
Think of the Hobbit or Kingdom of the Crystal Skull. Thats what it's like. 
Not a blatant remake like TFA\, but it borrows many plots and scenes from ESB and ROTJ.
I think I will forget about the Disney trilogy and stick to George Lucas' vision from now on. After the Battle of Endor\, there was peace in the Galaxy\, the force was in balance and they lived happily ever after. The end.
PS. I liked the porgs. They are cute.
